Death scouts train as spies and assassins for their cult. Other urdefhans scorn their stealthy methods, but none can argue with their results. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 [Urdefhan Death Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1388) **Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 84 **Perception** +15; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +14 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [moderate necrotic bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=938) (3), _+1 [shauth blade](/Weapons.aspx?ID=157)_ --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +16 **Will** +11 **HP** 92 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) **Necrotic Decay** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) When an urdefhan dies, its invisible flesh quickly rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a 5-foot emanation around the body. This gas deals 6d6 negative damage to creatures in this area as their flesh curdles and rots as well (DC 23 [basic Fortitude save](/Rules.aspx?ID=329)). --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** shauth blade +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6+4 slashing plus 1d6 persistent bleed and Wicked Bite **Melee** jaws +16, **Damage** 2d6+4 piercing plus Wicked Bite **Ranged** necrotic bomb +16 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)), **Damage** 2d6 negative plus 2 negative splash damage (and [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) on a critical hit) **Divine Innate Spells** DC 21, attack +13 - **1st** [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111) (at will; self only), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **2nd** [Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63) - **4th** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only) **Shauth Bite** The death scout deals an additional 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) with shauth blades and can use their Wicked Bite through magical shauth weapon Strikes. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The death scout deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Wicked Bite** **Requirements** The urdefhan damaged a creature with a jaws Strike on its last action; **Effect** The urdefhan maintains contact, turning the creature's flesh translucent around the site of the injury. The urdefhan chooses one of two options, each of which requires a DC 24 Fortitude save. If the jaws Strike was a critical hit, the creature suffers both effects, using the same save result for both.
  • **Drain Blood** The urdefhan drinks some of the creature's blood. On a failed save, the creature is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and the urdefhan regains 5 HP (or, on a critical failure, it's drained 2 and the urdefhan regains 10 HP).
  • **Drain Vitality** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) The urdefhan draws out some of the creature's vital essence. The creature becomes [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 hour on a failed save (or enfeebled 2 for 1 hour on a critical failure).
name: Urdefhan Death Scout
